channel.description: Building world-class software, teams, and products.

item.title: Off The Rails
item.author: Alex Tamoykin
item.description:
Rails is awesome, but it’s not the best framework for building fat client web applications. I’ll demonstrate why and how we’ve broken our Rails app into an Angular client and a thin API back end.

Here is the link to the video recording

and slides


Presented: SoCal AngularJs meetup, photo by Photo by javcon117.

Enjoy,

Alex
